climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: FASHIONABLE & FUNCTIONAL: These curtain panels drape beautifully and are designed with LightBlock and Thermax technology, they will provide room darkening blackout properties.
ROOM DARKENING OPACITY: room darkening opacity is designed for light control and privacy.

3 HANGING OPTIONS: Drape these curtain panels (1) from the rod pocket for a classic look, (2) using the hidden tabs to create an elegant pleated effect, or (3) using clip rings for easy, slide open and closed (clip rings are not included). Fits up to 1.5" diameter rod.
SET OF TWO CURTAIN PANELS: Includes two (2) curtain panels, each measuring 52 x 84".
MULTIPLE STYLING OPTIONS: The Crescendo curtain panels have a sophisicated layered look that offers multiple styling methods that will enhance your décor.
body.description: Dress up your windows with the Crescendo room darkening blackout curtain panels by Exclusive Home. Elegantly designed with a sateen woven blackout liner paired with an ombre sheer overlay, this curtain panel set offers multiple styling options for any space. Designed with Woven Thermax technology liner, they will block light, provide privacy and is energy efficient. They can be hung three ways: on a curtain rod up to 1.5" diameter using tabs, the rod pocket, or using clip rings (not included).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Exclusive Home Curtains: Sizes Our ready-made curtains are offered in an array of standard sizes sure to accompany the window and setting for any setting. You will find widths per panel ranging from 40 inches to 108 inch patio panel, and lengths offered in 63", 84", 96" and 108". Regardless of your application, you are sure to find ready to hang curtains for your home from us! Construction With Exclusive Home Curtains quality is paired with fabric that provides texture, depth, and sophistication. These constructions include jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, layered curtains, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. Further, we offer multiple top treatment options, including grommets, rod pocket / pole top, back tab, pinch pleat, clip ring, and more. Quality After producing and selling millions of curtains for well over a decade, the Exclusive Home product line is held to the highest quality standards for finished product. With every purchase will receive a professionally constructed curtain set that is sure to hang beautifully. Opacity From sheer to fully lined blackout, and everything in between, Exclusive Home Curtains has the window treatments to fit the light blocking needs you have. For simplicity, we utilize an opacity rating for each product to simplify the items light blocking qualities. Purchase with confidence, knowing how light will be filtered with each panel.

Modern & Contemporary Curtains Exclusive Home defines modern and contemporary curtains. We offer a variety of modern curtains to satisfy any decorating needs. From Industrial to Luxe and Mid-Century Modern to Contemporary decor, we have the perfect match for your home. Exclusive Home's variety of curtains are limitless. With geometric curtains, floral curtains, medallion curtains, and other patterned curtains in multiple sizes and constructions, there isn't an interior design or home decor we can't complete. Transitional Curtains Exclusive Home's transitional curtains are inspired by classic style and grace. Limitless splendor and elegance, these curtains are available in a selection of solid and patterned designs. Our transitional curtain collections offer an arrangement of refined color hues, quality craftsmanship, and beautiful designs to meet all your decorating needs. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, family room, dining room, bathroom, office, or any other window space that could use that perfect finishing touch. Indoor-Outdoor Curtains Let your worries blow away in the wind! Exclusive Home has the perfect outdoor curtains for your patio, lanai, porch, or any other outdoor area. Featuring a multitude of colors and designs, our outdoor curtains bring extra fashion and style to any outdoor living space. Our outdoor curtain panels drape beautifully and offer a UV Ray protectant. These beautiful panels are the ultimate finishing touch to any pergola, cabana, covered patio, gazebo, dock, beach home, or any outdoor extension of your home. Kids Curtains Exclusive Home's bright and fun kids curtains are perfect to help keep the sun out for that midday nap! With a variety of colors and sizes, there is no kid decor we can't match. Offering a variety of styles in chevron, geometric, and stripe designs. Impress your family and friends with your kid's rooms new curtains! Modern & Contemporary Transitional Indoor/Outdoor Kids

Exclusive Home Curtains - About Us: Exclusive Home Curtains home textiles and ready-made drapery are known for delivering high fashion designs, patterns, varying textures, and colors in an “affordable luxury” quality that today’s consumers expect. From classic solids to today’s top fashion trends, you are sure to find window panels to fit any look, mood, or style to complete your home décor project. We offer an array of fabric constructions as well, including jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. These constructions are offered in varying designs and colors including solids, prints, geometrics, gates, medallions, vertical stripes, horizontal stripes, embroidery, textures, thickness, lengths, widths, and burnouts. You will also find an array of hanging options, from grommet top, rod pocket, tab top, clip ring, and more.
Our Promise At Exclusive Home we strive for excellence. We take pride in our service, and the ability to offer luxury, affordable curtain panels for any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and pretty window sheers
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my teenage daughter's room and love that they have two layers of panels to cover the windows. (You will need a double window rod.) They keep the light out and I love how the colors flow from white to gray in the panels and have a "flowy" look to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'll start with the downfalls: they came extremely wrinkly and pretty dirty. We bought the white-black curtains, so the dirt on them stood out. Looked like someone with a dirty boot stepped right on them!Good things: they're beautiful! Such a perfect accent for our house. Very easy to clean! We have a black cat and I've yet to notice fur sticking to these as badly as I was expecting. We have a 9 ft wide window and these 2 panels covered it perfectly! They're obviously light filtering (white is always see through), so we bought a couple of blackout curtains to make the room darker a bit. These here though, the temperature in the house is so much cooler since we put them up! 100% worth it!! The sheer panels are attached at the top which allows us to pull back the white panels and have the sheer covering the windows. We just need to get tiebacks lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: First of all, these are nowhere near backlot. I had to buy blackout liners. In the Photo the middle one is with black liner, the left is this curtain with the old curtains behind (I was seeing if I could make them darker). The right is my old curtains. So these let a lot of light through. BUT they are so pretty I love them!! It was worth it to but the blackout liners because I think they are so pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these curtains! They were perfect for my daughters room and she loved them too. We have 9ft ceilings and I ordered the 108 length. They fall perfectly from ceiling to floor. These aren’t black out curtains but I wasn’t looking for black out so they are perfect. I like that they offer complete privacy but also still let in natural light. They are a bit wrinkly but that appears just from being folded for delivery. Im going to steam them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, versatile and quality
reviews.reviewText: I was so pleased with the appearance and quality of these, that I bought 3 sets for my living and dining areas. They add a clean, fresh, natural vibe to my living space. One set did have a cut in the sheer, but amazon replaced it quickly with no hassle or extra cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and elegant
reviews.reviewText: These are so beautiful! The transition from bright white to a light taupe at the ends, is absolutely stunning. However, you will definitely need to take the time to iron both the tulle and white underlay. I tried to hang them without ironing first and they looked like a tacky, crumpled tutu on my wall. Once ironed, they looked expensive and elegant. I hung mine from curtain rings and I took out the hems to add about 5 inches in length. The hem prevented them from softly puddling on the floor. Definitely not blackout curtains but I did not want blackout so that was a bonus for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty curtain, but it's light filtering at best. Has thermal looking layer but it's not black out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like these curtains so much 🥰 just perfect for my daughter’s room! Very stylish. The color is very nice!
I am thrilled with these curtains.They are in my bedroom and are very feminine. great value and highly recommend. Very easy to thread on curtain rod.
